content:
hello, two quick questions about structure definition urls for datatypes.
1) The structure definitions for primitives like boolean list urls like "http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/boolean", but these redirect back to the base Datatypes page: http://hl7.org/fhir/datatypes.html. Should the redirect for those have #boolean on them?
2) I notice that even for resources like Patient, curling the url in the structure definition returns full HTML - are there headers I can use for that URL to get the raw structure definition?

1) can you make a task for me to fix in R4 please
2) yes you should use Accept: per the spec
